info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 6:17AM PST until December 30 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: Also updated North Willamette Valley segment. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Heaviest accumulations will be over the West Hills, as well as parts of northern and eastern Clark County. Portland metro area likely to be only a rain snow mix without appreciable accumulation. Most of the accumulation expected to occur through mid morning. * WHERE...In Washington, Greater Vancouver Area. In Oregon, Greater Portland Metro Area. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
